attributes.action: Tell us if reclassification of State Pension to being a benefit is a pre-cursor to having it means tested.
attributes.additional_details: There is NOTHING our dishonourable electeds do which can be looked upon as an honest move with probity.  There is a move afoot to ensure that THE FULLY CONTRIBUTABLE STATE PENSION WILL VERY SOON BE MEANS TESTED.  We must, therefore, have the option to opt out of paying ERNIC, if it is not going to be used to fund a non-benefit old age pension.
